Package i5.las2peer.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AgentStorage
    Interface for agent storages.
    MessageHandler
    A simple interface to register message handlers to Mediators.
    MessageReceiver
    An interface for receiving messages in the p2p network.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    An Agent is the basic acting entity in the LAS2peer network.
    BasicAgentStorage
    A simple Hashtable based storage for agents.
    Context
    Each L2pThread is bound to a context, which is mainly determined by the executing agent.
    GroupAgent
    An agent representing a group of other agents.
    Mediator
    A Mediator acts on behalf of an PassphraseAgent.
    MonitoringAgent
    A MonitoringAgent is responsible for sending monitoring information collected at the MonitoringObserver.
    PassphraseAgent
    Base class for pass phrase protected agents.
    ServiceAgent
    A service agent represents a service and its access rights in the LAS2peer setting.
    ServiceInfoAgent
    This Agent is a public single instance agent for the solely purpose of keeping (loosely) track of all registered services in the network
    UserAgent
    An UserAgent represent a (End)user of the LAS2peer system.
    UserAgentManager
    Maps usernames and emails to UserAgents.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AgentException
    Basic exception thrown by agents on any problem.
    AgentLockedException  
    DuplicateEmailException  
    DuplicateLoginNameException  
    L2pSecurityException
    Base class for all security related exceptions in the LAS2peer setting.
    UserAgentException
